rdf:Description.dc:title: RDA Expression properties
rdf:Description.skos:note: Properties derived from RDA elements and relationship designators with the domain of RDA Expression.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abridgedAsExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that shortens a source expression without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that shortens a source expression without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation.
Expression d’une œuvre qui raccourcit l’expression source sans en changer le sens général ou le mode de présentation.
Una expresión de una obra que acorta la entidad fuente sin cambiar el sentido general o la forma de presentación.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abridged as (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: abridgementOfExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been abridged, i.e., shortened without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation of a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been abridged, i.e., shortened without changing the general meaning or manner of presentation of a source work.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été abrégée, c’est-à-dire raccourcie sans changer le sens général ou le mode de présentation de l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que fue abreviada, i.e., acortada sin cambiar el sentido general o la manera de presentación de la obra fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abridgement of (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: abridger
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by shortening or condensing an original work but leaving the nature and content substantially unchanged.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by shortening or condensing an original work but leaving the nature and content substantially unchanged.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en abrégeant ou en condensant l’œuvre originale tout en conservant la nature et le contenu de l’œuvre originale sensiblement inchangés.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra acortando o condensando la obra original pero dejando intacta la naturaleza y el contenido de la obra original.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Substantial modification that results in the creation of a new work is excluded.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has abridger

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorbedByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorbed by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that incorporates another expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that incorporates another expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui intègre une autre expression.
Una expresión de una obra que incorpora otra expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorbedInPartByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorbed in part by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that incorporates part of the content of another expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that incorporates part of the content of another expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui intègre une partie du contenu d’une autre expression.
Una expresión de una obra que incorpora parte del contenido de otra expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorptionInPartOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorption in part of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been partially incorporated into another expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been partially incorporated into another expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été partiellement intégrée dans une autre expression.
Una expresión de una obra que se ha incorporado parcialmente en otra expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: absorptionOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is absorption of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been incorporated into another expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been incorporated into another expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été intégrée dans une autre expression.
Una expresión de una obra que se ha incorporado en otra expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractedAsExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that abbreviates a source expression in a brief, objective manner.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that abbreviates a source expression in a brief, objective manner.
Expression d’une œuvre qui abrège l’expression source d’une manière brève et objective.
Una expresión de una obra que abrevia la expresión fuente en una forma breve y objetiva.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstracted as (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractedInExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstracted in (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is an abstracting and indexing service that abstracts the contents of a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is an abstracting and indexing service that abstracts the contents of a source expression.
Expression d’une œuvre (service d’analyse et d’indexation) qui résume le contenu d’une expression source.
Una expresión de una obra (un servicio de indización y resúmenes) que resume el contenido de una expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstract of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been abstracted, i.e., abbreviated in a brief, objective manner.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been abstracted, i.e., abbreviated in a brief, objective manner.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été résumée analytiquement, c’est-à-dire abrégée d’une manière brève et objective.
Una expresión de una obra que fue resumida, i.e., abreviada en una forma breve, objetiva.

rdf:Description.reg:name: abstractsForExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is abstracts for (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work whose contents have been abstracted by an abstracting and indexing service.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work whose contents have been abstracted by an abstracting and indexing service.
Expression d’une œuvre dont le contenu a été résumé par un service d’analyse et d’indexation.
Una expresión de una obra cuyos contenidos han sido resumidos por un servicio de indización y resúmenes.

rdf:Description.reg:name: accessibilityContent
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an indication of content that provides alternative sensory modes to perceive the primary content of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An indication of content that provides alternative sensory modes to perceive the primary content of an expression.
Contenu permettant aux handicapés sensoriels une meilleure compréhension d’un contenu que leur handicap les empêche de voir ou d’entendre parfaitement.
Contenido que ayuda a las personas con discapacidad sensorial para lograr una mayor comprensión de un contenido que su discapacidad les impide oir y ver en forma completa.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Accessibility content includes accessible labels, audio description, captioning, image description, sign language, and subtitles. Accessibility content does not include subtitles in a language different from the spoken content.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has accessibility content
har komplement för tillgänglighet

rdf:Description.reg:name: accompanyingExpressionRelationship
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is an augmentation of, or is augmented by, or is complemented by another expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is an augmentation of, or is augmented by, or is complemented by another expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui constitue une augmentation de l’expression ou qui est augmentée ou complétée par elle.
Una expresión de una obra que es un aumento de, o se ve aumentada por, o se complementa con la expresión.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has accompanying expression relationship with

rdf:Description.reg:name: actor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has actor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by acting as a cast member or player in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by acting as a cast member or player in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en agissant à titre de membre d’une distribution artistique ou de comédien dans une représentation musicale ou dramatique, etc.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra actuando como un miembro de un reparto o actor en una producción musical o teatral, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been modified for a purpose, use, or medium other than that for which it was originally intended.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been modified for a purpose, use, or medium other than that for which it was originally intended.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été modifiée pour une fin, une utilisation ou un mode d’expression autre que celui auquel elle était destinée à l’origine.
Una expresión de una obra que ha sido modificada para un propósito, uso o medio diferente del previsto originalmente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsChoreographyExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of movement based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of movement based on a source work.
Expression d’une œuvre consistant en mouvement (par exemple, de la danse) basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en movimiento (p. ej., danza) basada en la obra fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as choreography (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work based on a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that modifies a source expression for a purpose, use, or medium other than that for which it was originally intended.
Expression d’une œuvre qui modifie l’expression source pour une fin, une utilisation ou un mode d’expression autre que celui auquel elle était destinée à l’origine.
Una expresión de una obra que modifica la expresión fuente para un propósito, uso o medio diferente del previsto originalmente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsGraphicNovelExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a graphic novel based on a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A graphic novel based on a source expression.
Roman graphique basé sur l’expression source.
Una novela gráfica basada en la expresión fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as graphic novel (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsLibrettoExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio, based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio, based on a source work.
Expression d’une œuvre qui consiste en le texte d’un opéra ou d’une autre œuvre pour la scène musicale, ou bien d’un oratorio, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en el texto de una ópera u otra obra para representación musical, u oratorio, basada en la obra fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as libretto (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsMotionPictureExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a motion picture based on a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A motion picture based on a source expression.
Film basé sur l’expression source.
Una película cinematográfica basada en la expresión fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as motion picture (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsMotionPictureScreenplayExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of a screenplay for a motion picture, based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of a screenplay for a motion picture, based on a source work.
Expression d’une œuvre consistant en le scénario pour un film, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en el guión para una película cinematográfica, basado en la obra fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as motion picture screenplay (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsMusicalTheatreExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as musical theatre (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical theatre work based on a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical theatre work based on a source expression.
Expression d’une œuvre de théâtre musical basée sur l’expression source.
Una expresión de una obra de teatro musical basada en la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsNovelExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a novel adapted from a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a novel adapted from a source expression.
Expression d’un roman adapté de l’expression source.
Una expresión de una novela adaptada de la expresión fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as novel (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsOperaExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as opera (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of an opera based on a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of an opera based on a source expression.
Expression d’un opéra basée sur l’expression source.
Una expresión de una ópera basada en la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsOratorioExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of an oratorio based on a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of an oratorio based on a source expression.
Una expresión de un oratorio basada en la expresión fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as oratorio (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsRadioProgramExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as radio program (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a radio program based on a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A radio program based on a source expression.
Émission de radio basée sur l’expression source.
Un programa de radio basado en la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsRadioScriptExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of a script for a radio program, based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of a script for a radio program, based on a source work.
Expression d’une œuvre consistant en le script d’une émission de radio, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en el guión de un programa de radio, basado en la obra fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as radio script (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsScreenplayExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of a screenplay for a motion picture, television program, or video, based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of a screenplay for a motion picture, television program, or video, based on a source work.
Expression d’une œuvre consistant en le scénario pour un film, une émission de télévision ou une vidéo, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en el guión para una película cinematográfica, programa de televisión o video, basado en la obra fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as screenplay (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsTelevisionProgramExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as television program (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a television program based on a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A television program based on a source expression.
Émission de télévision basée sur l’expression source.
Un programa de televisión basado en la expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsTelevisionScreenplayExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of a screenplay for a television program, based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of a screenplay for a television program, based on a source work.
Expression d’une œuvre consistant en le scénario pour une émission de télévision, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en el guión para un programa de televisión, basado en la obra fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as television screenplay (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsVideoExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a video based on a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A video based on a source expression.
Vidéo basée sur l’expression source.
Un video basado en la expresión fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as video (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedAsVideoScreenplayExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of a screenplay for a video, based on a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of a screenplay for a video, based on a source work.
Expression d’une œuvre consistant en le scénario pour une vidéo, basée sur l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en el guión para un video, basado en la obra fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted as video screenplay (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: adaptedInVerseAsExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a literary composition in verse form adapted from a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a literary composition in verse form adapted from a source expression.
Expression d’une composition littéraire en vers adaptée de l’expression source.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como una composición literaria en forma de verso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is adapted in verse as (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: addendaExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of brief content that is essential for the completeness of an expression of another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of brief content that is essential for the completeness of an expression of another work.

Expression d’une œuvre qui consiste en brèves informations additionnelles, moins étendues qu’un supplément, mais essentielles à la complétude du texte de l’œuvre prédominante ; ces informations sont généralement ajoutées à la fin du contenu, mais peuvent aussi parfois être publiées séparément.

Una expresión de una obra que consiste en material adicional breve, menos extenso que un suplemento, pero esencial para la integridad del texto de la obra principal; generalmente se añade al final del contenido, pero algunas veces se publica separadamente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is addenda (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: addendaToExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is addenda to (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work whose content is completed with brief content from an expression of another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work whose content is completed with brief content from an expression of another work.

Expression d’une œuvre à laquelle sont ajoutées de brèves informations additionnelles, moins étendues qu’un supplément, mais essentielles à la complétude du contenu de l’œuvre ; ces informations sont généralement ajoutées à la fin du contenu, mais peuvent aussi parfois être publiées séparément.

Una expresión de una obra a la cual es añadido material adicional, menos extenso que un suplemento, pero esencial para la integridad del contenido de la obra; es añadido generalmente al final del contenido pero algunas veces se publica separadamente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: additionalScaleInformation
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an indication of supplemental information about scale.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An indication of supplemental information about scale.
Information complémentaire relative à l’échelle, comme un relevé de mesures comparatives ou une limitation de l’échelle à certaines portions du contenu.
Información complementaria sobre la escala tal como una mención de medidas comparativas o la limitación de la escala a partes particulares del contenido de un recurso.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Additional scale information includes statement of comparative measurements or limitation of the scale to particular parts of the content of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has additional scale information
har övrig skalinformation

rdf:Description.reg:name: analysedInExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a work that examines a source expression to identify its components and their relations.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that examines a source expression to identify its components and their relations.
Expression d’une œuvre qui examine l’expression source pour identifier ses composantes et leurs relations.
Una obra que examina la expresión fuente para identificar sus componentes y sus relaciones.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is analysed in (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: animator
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has animator
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a moving image work or computer program by giving apparent movement to inanimate objects or drawings.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a moving image work or computer program by giving apparent movement to inanimate objects or drawings.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre d’images animées ou d’un programme informatique en donnant l’illusion du mouvement à des objets inanimés ou à des dessins.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra de imagen en movimiento o un programa de computadora dando movimiento aparente a objetos o dibujos inanimados.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Creation of the drawings that are animated is excluded.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appendixExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work whose content augments an expression of another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work whose content augments an expression of another work.

Expression d’une œuvre qui forme une partie augmentante d’une autre œuvre et qui n’est pas essentielle à la complétude du contenu, telle qu’une liste de références, des tableaux statistiques et des indications explicatives ; elle peut soit figurer à la fin du contenu de l’œuvre prédominante, soit être publiée séparément.

Una expresión de una obra que forma una parte adicional de otra obra y que no es esencial para la integridad del contenido, tal como una lista de referencias, tablas estadísticas y material explicativo; puede ser material que se presenta al final del contenido de la obra principal, o ser publicado separadamente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is appendix (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Includes lists of references, statistical tables, and explanatory matter that are not essential to the completeness of the content.

rdf:Description.reg:name: appendixToExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is appendix to (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work whose content is augmented with content from an expression of another work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work whose content is augmented with content from an expression of another work.

Expression d’une œuvre prédominante qui est augmentée par une autre œuvre qui consiste en informations qui ne sont pas essentielles à la complétude du contenu, telles qu’une liste de références, des tableaux statistiques et des indications explicatives ; l’œuvre augmentante peut soit figurer à la fin du contenu, soit être publiée séparément.

Una expresión de una obra que es aumentada por otra obra que consiste en material que no es esencial para la integridad del contenido, tal como una lista de referencias, tablas estadísticas, material explicativo; la obra adicional puede venir al final del contenido, o ser publicada separadamente
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Includes lists of references, statistical tables, and explanatory matter that are not essential to the completeness of the content.

rdf:Description.reg:name: arrangedAs
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that rewrites a source expression for a medium of performance different from that for which the work was originally intended.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that rewrites a source expression for a medium of performance different from that for which the work was originally intended.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale qui réécrit l’expression source pour une distribution d’exécution différente de celle à laquelle l’œuvre était destinée à l’origine.
Una expresión de una obra que reescribe la expresión fuente para un medio de interpretación diferente de aquel para el cual fue prevista originalmente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is arranged as

rdf:Description.reg:name: arrangementOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is arrangement of
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that has been rewritten for a medium of performance different from that for which the work was originally intended.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that has been rewritten for a medium of performance different from that for which the work was originally intended.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été réécrite pour une distribution d’exécution différente de celle à laquelle l’œuvre était destinée à l’origine.
Una expresión de una obra musical que fue reescrita para un medio de interpretación diferente de aquel para la que fue originalmente prevista.

rdf:Description.reg:name: arrangerOfMusic
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a musical work by rewriting a composition for a medium of performance different from that for which a work was originally intended.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Contribution includes modification of a work for the same medium of performance, etc., keeping the musical substance of the original composition essentially unchanged, and excludes substantial modification that results in the creation of a new musical work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a musical work by rewriting a composition for a medium of performance different from that for which a work was originally intended.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre musicale en réécrivant la composition pour une distribution d’exécution différente de celle à laquelle l’œuvre est originellement destinée.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra musical reescribiendo la composición para un medio de una interpretación diferente de aquel para el que se habia concebido la obra.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has arranger of music

rdf:Description.reg:name: artDirector
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by overseeing artists and craftspeople who build sets for moving image productions.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by overseeing artists and craftspeople who build sets for moving image productions.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en supervisant les artistes et les artisans qui construisent les décors pour des productions d’images animées.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra supervisando los artistas y obreros que construyen los platos para producciones de imágenes en movimiento.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has art director

rdf:Description.reg:name: aspectRatio
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has aspect ratio
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a numerical ratio of the width to the height of a moving image.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A numerical ratio of the width to the height of a moving image.
Le rapport entre la largeur et la hauteur d’une image animée.
La relación de la anchura con la altura de una imagen móvil.

rdf:Description.reg:name: aspectRatioDesignation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has aspect ratio designation
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a general designation of the ratio of the width to the height of a moving image.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A general designation of the ratio of the width to the height of a moving image.

rdf:Description.reg:name: audioEngineer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has audio engineer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to the audio content of an expression by managing the technical aspects of sound during the processes of recording, mixing, and reproduction.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to the audio content of an expression by managing the technical aspects of sound during the processes of recording, mixing, and reproduction.

rdf:Description.reg:name: augmentationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is augmentation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work whose content is added to by another expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work whose content is added to by another expression.
Expression d’une œuvre dont le contenu est accru par une autre expression.
Una expresión de una obra cuyo contenido es añadido por otra expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: augmentedByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is augmented by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that adds to the content of a predominant expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that adds to the content of a predominant expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui ajoute au contenu d’une expression prédominante.
Una expresión de una obra que añade al contenido de una expresión principal.

rdf:Description.reg:name: award
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a formal recognition of excellence, etc., given by an award- or prize-granting body, for the content of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A formal recognition of excellence, etc., given by an award- or prize-granting body, for the content of an expression.
Reconnaissance officielle d’excellence, etc. accordée au contenu d’une ressource par un organisme octroyant une récompense ou un prix.
Un reconocimiento formal de excelencia, etc., otorgado por una entidad que concede premios o reconocimientos, por el contenido de un recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has award
har utmärkelse

rdf:Description.reg:name: basedOnExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is based on (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression used as the basis for a derivative expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression used as the basis for a derivative expression.
Expression servant de base à une expression dérivée.
Una expresión utilizada como base para una expresión derivada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: cadenzaComposedForExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is cadenza composed for (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work such as a concerto for which an ornamental passage for a soloist has been composed, either by the same or a different composer.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work such as a concerto for which an ornamental passage for a soloist has been composed, either by the same or a different composer.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale telle qu’un concerto pour laquelle un passage ornemental pour soliste a été composé, soit par le même compositeur, soit par un compositeur différent.
Una expresión de una obra musical tal como un concierto para el cual se ha compuesto un pasaje ornamental para solista, ya sea por el mismo o diferente compositor.

rdf:Description.reg:name: cadenzaExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is cadenza (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work consisting of an ornamental passage for a soloist, added to a musical work such as a concerto, either by the same or a different composer.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work consisting of an ornamental passage for a soloist, added to a musical work such as a concerto, either by the same or a different composer.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale consistant en un passage ornemental pour soliste, ajouté à une œuvre musicale telle qu’un concerto, soit par le même compositeur, soit par un compositeur différent.
Una expresión de una obra musical que consiste en un pasaje ornamental para un solista, añadida a una obra musical como un concierto, por igual o diferente compositor.

rdf:Description.reg:name: capture information
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a place, date, or other information associated with the recording, filming, etc., of the content of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A place, date, or other information associated with the recording, filming, etc., of the content of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: lieu et date de la captation
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Le lieu et la date associés à la captation (c’est-à-dire l’enregistrement, le tournage, etc.) du contenu de la ressource.
El lugar y fecha asociados con la captura (i.e., grabación, filmación, etc.) del contenido de un recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has capture information
har inspelningsort och inspelningstid

rdf:Description.reg:name: cartographerExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing additional cartography, or by modifying previous cartography.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing additional cartography, or by modifying previous cartography.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant une cartographie additionnelle ou en modifiant la cartographie antérieure.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra proporcionando cartografía adicional o modificando la cartografía anterior.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has cartographer (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: catalogueExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is catalogue (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that consists of a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that consists of a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.
Expression d’une œuvre qui consiste en une énumération complète des items classés systématiquement.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en una enumeración completa de ítems ordenados sistemáticamente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: catalogueOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is catalogue of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work used as the basis for a catalogue, i.e., a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for a catalogue, i.e., a complete enumeration of items arranged systematically.
Expression d’une œuvre servant de base à un catalogue, c’est-à-dire une énumération complète des items classés systématiquement.
Una expresión de una obra utilizada como base para un catálogo, i.e., una enumeración completa de ítems ordenados sistemáticamente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: censor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by revising the content for the purpose of suppressing parts deemed objectionable on moral, political, military, or other grounds, but leaving the nature and content substantially unchanged.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by revising the content for the purpose of suppressing parts deemed objectionable on moral, political, military, or other grounds, but leaving the nature and content substantially unchanged.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Substantial modification that results in the creation of a new work is excluded.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has censor

rdf:Description.reg:name: choralConductor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has choral conductor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a conductor contributing to an expression of a musical work by leading a choral performing group in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A conductor contributing to an expression of a musical work by leading a choral performing group in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
Un intérprete que contribuye a la expresión de una obra musical dirigiendo un grupo de interpretación coral en una presentación musical o teatral, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographerExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing additional choreography, or by modifying previous choreography.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing additional choreography, or by modifying previous choreography.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant une chorégraphie additionnelle ou en modifiant la chorégraphie antérieure.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra proporcionando coreografía adicional, o modificando la coreografía anterior.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has choreographer (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographicAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is choreographic adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a work consisting of movement.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a work consisting of movement.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en œuvre consistant en mouvement (par exemple, de la danse).
Una expresión de una obra que ha sido adaptada como una obra que consiste en movimiento (p. ej., danza).

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographyExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides choreography for use in a related expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides choreography for use in a related expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit la chorégraphie destinée à être utilisée dans l’expression en relation.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona la coreografía para uso en la expresión relacionada.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is choreography (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: choreographyForExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses choreography of a related expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses choreography of a related expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise la chorégraphie de l’expression en relation.
Una expresión de una obra que usa la coreografía de la expresión relacionada.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is choreography for (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: colourContent
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a presence of colour, tone, etc., in the content of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A presence of colour, tone, etc., in the content of an expression.
La présence de couleur, teinte, etc. dans le contenu d’une ressource.
La presencia de color, tono, etc., en el contenido de un recurso.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Black, white, single colour shades of black, single colour tints of white, and single colour tones of gray are considered to be single colours.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has colour content
har färginnehåll

rdf:Description.reg:name: colourist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has colourist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by applying colour to drawings, prints, photographs, maps, moving images, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by applying colour to drawings, prints, photographs, maps, moving images, etc.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra aplicando color a los dibujos, grabados, fotografías, mapas, imágenes en movimiento, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: commentaryInExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a work that contains a set of explanatory or critical notes on a described expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that contains a set of explanatory or critical notes on a described expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui contient un ensemble de notes explicatives ou critiques sur l’expression décrite.
Una obra que contiene un conjunto de notas críticas o explicativas de la expresión descrita.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is commentary in (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: commentator
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has commentator
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by providing interpretation, analysis, or a discussion of the subject matter on a recording, film, or other audiovisual medium.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by providing interpretation, analysis, or a discussion of the subject matter on a recording, film, or other audiovisual medium.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant une interprétation, une analyse ou une explication du sujet sur un enregistrement, un film ou un autre support audiovisuel.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra dando una interpretación, análisis, o una discusión del tema en una grabación, película u otro medio audiovisual.

rdf:Description.reg:name: complementedByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is complemented by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work paired with another expression without either expression being considered to predominate.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work paired with another expression without either expression being considered to predominate.
Expression d’une œuvre appariée à une autre expression sans qu’aucune des deux expressions ne soit considérée comme prédominante.
Una expresión de una obra unida con otra entidad sin que ninguna pueda ser considerada como principal

rdf:Description.reg:name: composerExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression by adding music to a work that originally lacked it, by composing new music to substitute for original music, or by composing new music to supplement existing music.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression by adding music to a work that originally lacked it, by composing new music to substitute for original music, or by composing new music to supplement existing music.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression en ajoutant de la musique à une œuvre qui n’en avait pas à l’origine, en composant une nouvelle musique pour remplacer la musique originale ou en composant une nouvelle musique pour compléter la musique existante.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión agregando música a una obra que originalmente no tenía, componiendo música nueva para sustituir la música original, o componiendo nueva música para complementar la música existente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has composer (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: concordanceExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that consists of an index of all the words in a predominant expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that consists of an index of all the words in a predominant expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui consiste en un index de tous les mots de l’expression prédominante.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en un índice de todas las palabras en la expresión principal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is concordance (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: concordanceToExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work used as the basis for a concordance, i.e., an index of all the words in a predominant expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for a concordance, i.e., an index of all the words in a predominant expression.
Expression d’une œuvre servant de base à une concordance, c’est-à-dire un index de tous les mots de l’expression prédominante.
Una expresión de una obra utilizada como base para una concordancia, i.e., un índice de todas las palabras en la expresión principal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is concordance to (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: conductor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has conductor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a musical work by leading a performing group in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a musical work by leading a performing group in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre musicale en dirigeant un groupe d’interprètes (orchestre, chorale, opéra, etc.) dans une représentation musicale ou dramatique, etc.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra musical dirigiendo un grupo de interpretación (orquesta, coro, ópera, etc.) en una presentación musical o teatral, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: containedInExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is contained in (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a larger work of which the expression is a discrete component.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a larger work of which the expression is a discrete component.
Expression d’une œuvre plus vaste dont l’expression est une composante distincte.
Una expresión de una obra mayor de la cual una parte es un componente separado.

rdf:Description.reg:name: containerOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is container of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is a discrete component of a larger expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is a discrete component of a larger expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui est une composante distincte d’une expression plus vaste.
Una expresión de una obra que es un componente separado de una expresión mayor.

rdf:Description.reg:name: contentType
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has content type
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a categorization reflecting the fundamental form of communication in which the content is expressed and the human sense through which it is intended to be perceived.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Content type also reflects the number of spatial dimensions and the presence or absence of movement in which content expressed in the form of an image or images is intended to be perceived.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A categorization reflecting the fundamental form of communication in which the content is expressed and the human sense through which it is intended to be perceived.
Catégorisation reflétant la forme fondamentale de communication sous laquelle le contenu est exprimé et le sens humain par lequel il doit être perçu.
Una categorización que refleja la forma fundamental de comunicación en la cual se expresa el contenido y el sentido humano a través por el se espera sea percibido.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har innehållstyp

rdf:Description.reg:name: continuationInPartOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is continuation in part of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that split into two or more separate expressions with new titles.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that split into two or more separate expressions with new titles.
Expression d’une œuvre qui s’est scindée en deux ou plusieurs expressions distinctes avec de nouveaux titres.
Una expresión de una obra que se divide en dos o más entidades separadas con nuevos títulos.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to serials.

rdf:Description.reg:name: continuationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is continuation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is continued by the content of an expression of a later work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is continued by the content of an expression of a later work.
Expression d’une œuvre qui est continuée par le contenu d’une expression d’une œuvre ultérieure.
Una expresión de una obra que es continuada por el contenido de una expresión de una obra posterior.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to serials.

rdf:Description.reg:name: continuedByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is continued by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work whose content continues an expression of an earlier work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work whose content continues an expression of an earlier work.
Expression d’une œuvre dont le contenu continue une expression d’une œuvre antérieure.
Una expresión de una obra cuyo contenido continúa una entidad anterior bajo un título nuevo.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to serials.

rdf:Description.reg:name: continuedInPartByExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is continued in part by (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work part of whose content separated from an earlier expression to form a new expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work part of whose content separated from an earlier expression to form a new expression.
Expression d’une œuvre dont une partie du contenu a été détachée d’une expression antérieure pour former une nouvelle expression.
Una expresión de una obra parte de cuyo contenido se separó de una expresión anterior para formar una nueva expresión.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to serials.

rdf:Description.reg:name: contributor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has contributor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Contributors include editors, translators, arrangers of music, performers, etc.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har bidragsgivare

rdf:Description.reg:name: costumeDesigner
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by designing costumes for a moving image production or for a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by designing costumes for a moving image production or for a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en créant les costumes pour une production d’images animées ou bien pour une représentation ou un spectacle musical ou dramatique.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra diseñando el vestuario para una producción de una imagen en movimiento o para una producción teatral o musical o un espectáculo.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has costume designer

rdf:Description.reg:name: courtReporter
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has court reporter
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by preparing a court's opinions for publication.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by preparing a court's opinions for publication.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en préparant les opinions d’un tribunal aux fins de publication.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra preparando las opiniones del tribunal para publicación.

rdf:Description.reg:name: critiquedInExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a work that contains a critical evaluation of a described expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that contains a critical evaluation of a described expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui contient une évaluation critique de l’expression décrite.
Una obra que contiene una evaluación crítica de la expresión descrita.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is critiqued in (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: dancer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has dancer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by dancing in a musical, dramatic, etc., presentation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by dancing in a musical, dramatic, etc., presentation.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en dansant dans une représentation musicale ou dramatique, etc.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra danzando en una presentación musical, dramática, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: dateOfCapture
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a date associated with the recording, filming, etc., of the content of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A date associated with the recording, filming, etc., of the content of an expression.
La date ou la fourchette de dates associée à la captation (c’est-à-dire l’enregistrement, le tournage, etc.) du contenu de la ressource.
Una fecha o rango de fechas asociadas con la captura (i.e, grabación, filmación, etc.) del contenido del recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has date of capture
har inspelningstid

rdf:Description.reg:name: dateOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has date of expression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an earliest date associated with an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An earliest date associated with an expression.
La date la plus ancienne associée à une expression.
La fecha más antigua asociada con una expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: derivativeExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is derivative (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression that is a modification of a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression that is a modification of a source expression.
Expression qui est une modification d’une expression source.
Una expresión que es una modificación de una expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: derivativeExpressionRelationship
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is based on or is a derivative of another expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is based on or is a derivative of another expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui est basée sur l’expression ou en constitue un dérivé.
Una expresión de una obra que se basa en, o es una derivada de la expresión.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has derivative expression relationship

rdf:Description.reg:name: describedInExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is described in (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a work that describes a described expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that describes a described expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui décrit une expression.
Una obra que describe una expresión descrita.

rdf:Description.reg:name: detailsOfAspectRatioDesignation
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has details of aspect ratio designation
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to details of the ratio of the width to the height of a moving image.

Major revision, adaptation, etc., that substantially changes the nature and content of the original work, resulting in a new work, is excluded.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra revisando o aclarando el contenido, por ej., agregando una introducción, notas u otro material crítico.

har identifikator för uttrycket

rdf:Description.reg:name: illustrationsExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work consisting of pictorial content designed to explain or decorate an augmented expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work consisting of pictorial content designed to explain or decorate an augmented expression.
Expression d’une œuvre consistant en contenu visuel destiné à expliquer ou à décorer l’expression augmentée.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en contenido pictórico diseñado para explicar o decorar la entidad aumentada.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is illustrations (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: illustrationsForExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is illustrations for (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is augmented by pictorial content designed to explain or decorate it.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is augmented by pictorial content designed to explain or decorate it.
Expression d’une œuvre qui est augmentée par du contenu visuel destiné à l’expliquer ou à la décorer.
Una expresión de una obra que es aumentada con contenido pictórico diseñado para explicarla o decorarla.

rdf:Description.reg:name: illustrativeContent
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a presence of one or more still images that accompany the primary content of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A presence of image content that accompanies the primary content of an expression.
Contenu destiné à illustrer le contenu principal d’une ressource.
Contenido destinado a ilustrar el contenido primario de un recurso..
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Tables containing only words and/or numerical data are excluded.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has illustrative content
har illustrativt innehåll

rdf:Description.reg:name: illustrator
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has illustrator
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by supplementing the primary content with drawings, diagrams, photographs, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by supplementing the primary content with drawings, diagrams, photographs, etc.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en complétant le contenu principal avec des dessins, des diagrammes, des photographies, etc.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra complementando el contenido primario con dibujos, diagramas, fotografías, etc.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Creation of content that is primarily artistic is excluded.

rdf:Description.reg:name: imitatedAsExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that copies the style or content of a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that copies the style or content of the source work.
Expression d’une œuvre qui copie le style ou le contenu de l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra que copia el estilo o contenido de la obra fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is imitated as (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: imitationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is imitation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work whose style or content is copied in a derivative work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work whose style or content is copied in a derivative work.
Expression d’une œuvre dont le style ou le contenu est copié dans une œuvre dérivée.
Una expresión de una obra cuyo estilo o contenido es copiado en una obra derivada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: incidentalMusicExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that that provides incidental music for a play or other spoken work for the stage.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that that provides incidental music for a play or other spoken work for the stage.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale qui fournit la musique de scène pour une pièce de théâtre ou une autre œuvre parlée pour la scène.
Una expresión de una obra musical que proporciona la música incidental para una obra de teatro u otra obra hablada para el escenario.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is incidental music (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: incidentalMusicForExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work such as a play or other spoken work for the stage that uses a musical work as incidental music.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work such as a play or other spoken work for the stage that uses a musical work as incidental music.
Expression d’une œuvre telle qu’une pièce de théâtre ou une autre œuvre parlée pour la scène qui utilise l’œuvre musicale comme musique de scène.
Una expresión de una obra tal como una obra de teatro u otra obra hablada para escena que usa la obra musical como música incidental.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is incidental music for (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: indexedInExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is indexed in (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is an abstracting and indexing service that indexes the contents of a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is an abstracting and indexing service that indexes the contents of a source expression.
Expression d’une œuvre (service d’analyse et d’indexation) qui indexe le contenu d’une expression source.
Una expresión de una obra (un servicio de indización y resúmenes) que indiza el contenido de una expresión fuente.

rdf:Description.reg:name: indexExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides a systematic, alphabetical guide to the contents of a predominant expression, usually keyed to page numbers or other reference codes.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides a systematic, alphabetical guide to the contents of a predominant expression, usually keyed to page numbers or other reference codes.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit un guide méthodique et alphabétique du contenu de l’expression prédominante, renvoyant généralement à des numéros de page ou à d’autres codes de référence.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona una guía alfabética y sistemática al contenido de la entidad principal, generalmente indicando los números de página u otros códigos de referencia.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is index (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: indexingForExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is indexing for (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work whose contents have been indexed by an abstracting and indexing service.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work whose contents have been indexed by an abstracting and indexing service.
Expression d’une œuvre dont le contenu a été indexé par un service d’analyse et d’indexation.
Una expresión de una obra cuyo contenido ha sido indizado por un servicio de indización y resúmenes.

rdf:Description.reg:name: indexToExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work used as the basis for an index, i.e., a systematic, alphabetical guide to the contents of a predominant expression, usually keyed to page numbers or other reference codes.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for an index, i.e., a systematic, alphabetical guide to the contents of a predominant expression, usually keyed to page numbers or other reference codes.

Expression d’une œuvre servant de base à un index, c’est-à-dire un guide méthodique et alphabétique du contenu de l’expression prédominante, renvoyant généralement à des numéros de page ou à d’autres codes de référence.

Una expresión de una obra utilizada como base para un índice, i.e., una guía alfabética y sistemática del contenido la entidad principal, generalmente indicando los números de página u otros códigos de referencia.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is index to (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: instructor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has instructor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by teaching or providing a demonstration.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by teaching or providing a demonstration.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en transmettant des connaissances par la théorie ou la pratique.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra impartiendo formación o proporcionando una demostración.

rdf:Description.reg:name: instrumentalConductor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has instrumental conductor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a conductor contributing to an expression of a musical work by leading an instrumental performing group in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A conductor contributing to an expression of a musical work by leading an instrumental performing group in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
Un intérprete que contribuye a la expresión de una obra musical dirigiendo un grupo de interpretación instrumental en una presentación musical o teatral, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: instrumentalist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has instrumentalist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by playing a musical instrument.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by playing a musical instrument.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en jouant d’un instrument de musique.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra tocando un instrumento musical.

rdf:Description.reg:name: intervieweeExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has interviewee (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by responding to an interviewer, usually a reporter, pollster, or some other information gathering agent.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by responding to an interviewer, usually a reporter, pollster, or some other information gathering agent.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en répondant à un intervieweur, habituellement un journaliste, un sondeur ou un autre agent recueillant de l’information.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra respondiendo a un entrevistador, generalmente un reportero, encuestador, o algún otro agente recolector de información.

rdf:Description.reg:name: interviewerExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has interviewer (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by acting as an interviewer, reporter, pollster, or some other information gathering agent.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by acting as an interviewer, reporter, pollster, or some other information gathering agent.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en agissant à titre d’intervieweur, de journaliste, de sondeur ou d’autre agent recueillant de l’information.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra actuando como entrevistador, reportero, encuestador, o algún otro agente recolector de información.

rdf:Description.reg:name: languageOfContent
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a language used to express the content of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A language used to express the content of an expression.
Langue utilisée pour exprimer le contenu d’une ressource.
Una lengua utilizada para expresar el contenido de un recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has language of content

rdf:Description.reg:name: languageOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has language of expression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a language in which a work is expressed.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A language in which a work is expressed.
Langue dans laquelle une œuvre est exprimée.
Una lengua en la que se expresa una obra

rdf:Description.reg:name: letterer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has letterer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an illustrator contributing to an expression of a comic book, graphic novel, etc., by drawing the text and graphic sound effects.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An illustrator contributing to an expression of a comic book, graphic novel, etc., by drawing the text and graphic sound effects.
Illustrateur contribuant à une expression d’une bande dessinée, d’un roman graphique, etc. en dessinant le texte et les effets sonores graphiques.
Un ilustrador que contribuye a una expresión de un libro cómico, novela gráfica, etc., mediante el dibujo del texto y efectos de sonido gráfico.

rdf:Description.reg:name: librettoBasedOnExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is libretto based on (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio.
Expression d’une œuvre servant de base au texte d’un opéra ou d’une autre œuvre pour la scène musicale, ou bien d’un oratorio.
Una expresión de una obra usada como base para el texto de una ópera u otra obra para representación musical u oratorio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: librettoExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is libretto (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides the text of an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit le texte d’un opéra ou d’une autre œuvre pour la scène musicale, ou bien d’un oratorio.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona el texto de una ópera u otra obra para representación musical, o un oratorio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: librettoForExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work such as an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio, that uses the text of a related work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work such as an opera or other work for the musical stage, or an oratorio, that uses the text of a related work.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale telle qu’un opéra ou une autre œuvre pour la scène musicale, ou telle qu’un oratorio, qui utilise le texte de l’œuvre en relation.
Una expresión de una obra musical tal como una ópera u otra obra para representación musical, o un oratorio, que utiliza el texto de la obra relacionada.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is libretto for (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: lightingDesigner
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has lighting designer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by designing and creating lighting components.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by designing and creating lighting components.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra mediante el diseño y la creación de componentes de iluminación.

rdf:Description.reg:name: makeUpArtist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has make-up artist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by applying make-up and prosthetics for a moving image production or for a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by applying make-up and prosthetics for a moving image production or for a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra mediante la aplicación de maquillaje y prótesis para una producción de imágenes en movimiento o para una presentación o espectáculo musical o dramático.

rdf:Description.reg:name: manifestationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has manifestation of expression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a physical embodiment of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A physical embodiment of an expression.
Matérialisation d’une expression.
Una materialización física de una expresión.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har manifestation av uttryck

rdf:Description.reg:name: mediumOfPerformanceOfMusicalContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has medium of performance of musical content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an instrument, voice, or ensemble used, or intended to be used, for performance of musical content.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: medium of performance of musical content
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An instrument, voice, and/or ensemble used, or intended to be used, for performance of musical content.
Le ou les instruments, la ou les voix, etc. utilisés (ou destinés à être utilisés) dans une exécution d’un contenu musical.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: medio de interpretación del contenido musical
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: El instrumento, instrumentos, voz, voces, etc., utilizados para (o con el propósito de ser utilizados para) la ejecución del contenido musical.

rdf:Description.reg:name: mergedToFormExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is merged to form (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work formed from the coming together of two or more expressions.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work formed from the coming together of two or more expressions.
Expression d’une œuvre formée par l’assemblage de deux ou plusieurs expressions.
Una expresión de una obra formada de la unión de dos o más expresiones.

rdf:Description.reg:name: mergerOfExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that came together with one or more other expressions to form a new expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that came together with one or more other expressions to form a new expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui s’est assemblée avec une ou plusieurs autres expressions pour former la nouvelle expression.
Una expresión de una obra que se une con una o más expresiones para formar una expresión nueva.
