rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is merger of (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: minuteTaker
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has minute taker
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent responsible for recording the minutes of a meeting.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for recording the minutes of a meeting.
Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de rédiger le procès-verbal d’une réunion.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable de registrar las actas de una reunión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: mixingEngineer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has mixing engineer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an audio engineer contributing to the audio content of an expression by manipulating, mixing, and assembling the multiple tracks of a recording.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Remixing activities that substantially change the nature and content of the original work, resulting in a new work, are excluded.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An audio engineer contributing to the audio content of an expression by manipulating, mixing, and assembling the multiple tracks of a recording.

rdf:Description.reg:name: moderator
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has moderator
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by leading a program, often broadcast, where topics are discussed, usually with participation of experts in fields related to the discussion.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by leading a program, often broadcast, where topics are discussed, usually with participation of experts in fields related to the discussion.

Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en dirigeant une émission (souvent diffusée) où des sujets sont discutés, habituellement avec la participation d’experts dans les domaines reliés à la discussion.

Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra dirigiendo un programa (a menudo una transmisión) en el cual los temas se discuten generalmente con la participación de expertos en esos temas.

rdf:Description.reg:name: modifiedByVariationAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is modified by variation as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work in which melodic, thematic, or harmonic material taken from a source work forms a discrete theme, which is repeated one or more times with subsequent modifications.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work in which melodic, thematic, or harmonic material taken from a source work forms a discrete theme, which is repeated one or more times with subsequent modifications.

Expression d’une œuvre musicale dans laquelle de la matière mélodique, thématique ou harmonique tirée de l’œuvre source forme un thème distinct qui est répété une ou plusieurs fois avec des modifications subséquentes.

Una expresión de una obra musical en la cual el material melódico, temático o harmónico se toma de la obra fuente para formar un tema separado, el cual se repite una o mas veces con las subsecuentes modificaciones.

rdf:Description.reg:name: motionPictureAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is motion picture adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a motion picture.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en film.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como película cinematográfica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: motionPictureMusicExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is motion picture music (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that is used in a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that is used in a motion picture.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale utilisée dans un film.
Una expresión de una obra musical que es usada en una película cinematográfica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: motionPictureScreenplayBasedOnExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a screenplay for a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a screenplay for a motion picture.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en scénario pour un film.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como guión para una película cinematográfica, programa de televisión o vídeo.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is motion picture screenplay based on (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: motionPictureScreenplayExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides text for a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides text for a motion picture.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit le texte d’un film.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona el texto para una película cinematográfica.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is motion picture screenplay (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicalDirector
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by coordinating the activities of composers, sound editors, and sound mixers for a moving image production or for a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by coordinating the activities of composers, sound editors, and sound mixers for a moving image production or for a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en coordonnant les activités du compositeur, du monteur son et des mixeurs de son pour une production d’images animées ou bien pour une représentation ou un spectacle dramatique ou musical.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra coordinando las actividades del compositor, el editor de sonido, y los mezcladores de sonido para una producción de una imagen en movimiento o para una producción teatral, musical o un espectáculo.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has musical director

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicalSettingOfExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides text for a non-dramatic musical work, other than an oratorio.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides text for a non-dramatic musical work, other than an oratorio.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit le texte d’une œuvre musicale non théâtrale, autre qu’un oratorio.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona el texto de una obra musical no dramática, diferente de un oratorio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is musical setting of (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicalTheatreAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is musical theatre adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a musical theatre work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a musical theatre work.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en œuvre de théâtre musical.
Una expresión de una obra que ha sido adaptada como una obra de teatro musical.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that is used in a motion picture, play, television program, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that is used in a motion picture, play, television program, etc.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale utilisée dans un film, une pièce de théâtre, une émission de télévision, etc.
Una expresión de una obra musical que se usa en una película cinematográfica, obra de teatro, programa de televisión, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicForExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work such as a motion picture, play, television program, etc., that uses a musical work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work such as a motion picture, play, television program, etc. that uses a musical work.
Expression d’une œuvre telle qu’un film, une pièce de théâtre, une émission de télévision, etc. qui utilise l’œuvre musicale.
Una expresión de una obra tal como una película cinematográfica, obra de teatro, programa de televisión, etc., que usa una obra musical.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music for (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicForMotionPictureExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses a musical work in a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses a musical work in a motion picture.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise l’œuvre musicale dans un film.
Una expresión de una obra que usa la obra musical en una película cinematográfica.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music for motion picture (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicForRadioProgramExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses a musical work in a radio program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses a musical work in a radio program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise l’œuvre musicale dans une émission de radio.
Una expresión de una obra que usa la obra musical en un programa radiofónico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music for radio program (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicForTelevisionProgramExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses a musical work in a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses a musical work in a television program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise l’œuvre musicale dans une émission de télévision.
Una expresión de una obra que usa la obra musical en un programa de televisión.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music for television program (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicForVideoExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses a musical work in a video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses a musical work in a video.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise l’œuvre musicale dans une vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra que usa la obra musical en un video
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is music for video (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: musicProgrammer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has music programmer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a musical work by using electronic audio devices and/or computer software to generate sounds.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: The creation of a new musical work is excluded.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a musical work by using electronic audio devices and/or computer software to generate sounds.
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a musical work by using electronic audio devices or computer software to generate sounds.

rdf:Description.reg:name: narrator
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has narrator
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by reading aloud or giving an account of an act, occurrence, course of events, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by reading aloud or giving an account of an act, occurrence, course of events, etc.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en lisant à voix haute ou en rendant compte d’une action, d’une situation, du déroulement des événements, etc.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra leyendo en voz alta o hablando para dar cuenta de un acto, acontecimiento, desarrollo de eventos, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: noteOnCapture
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has note on capture
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a note providing information associated with the recording, filming, etc., of the content of an expression.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Note on capture includes the circumstances such as a live or studio recording, the equipment used, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A note providing information associated with the recording, filming, etc., of the content of an expression.

rdf:Description.reg:name: noteOnChangesInContentCharacteristics
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a note on changes in content characteristics that occur in subsequent issues or parts of an expression issued in successive parts or between iterations of an integrating resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: note on changes in content characteristics
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A note on changes in content characteristics that occur in subsequent issues or parts of an expression issued in successive parts or between iterations of an integrating resource.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: note relative aux changements de caractéristiques du contenu
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Note portant sur les changements de caractéristiques du contenu survenant dans les livraisons ou les parties ultérieures d’une ressource publiée en parties successives ou bien entre les différentes itérations d’une ressource intégratrice.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: nota sobre cambios en las características del contenido
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Una nota sobre cambios en las características que ocurren en entregas o partes subsecuentes de un recurso publicado en partes sucesivas o entre iteraciones de un recurso integrable.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has note on changes in content characteristics
har anmärkning om förändringar i innehållsegenskaper

rdf:Description.reg:name: noteOnExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has note on expression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a note providing additional information about content recorded as an expression attribute.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A note providing additional information about content recorded as an expression attribute.
Annotation fournissant un complément d’information relatif au contenu enregistré comme attribut de l’expression.
Una anotación que proporciona información adicional sobre contenido registrado como un atributo de la expresión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: novelizationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is novelization of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a novel.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a novel.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en roman.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como novela.

rdf:Description.reg:name: onScreenParticipant
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has on-screen participant
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a nonfiction moving image work by taking an active role as a participant.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a nonfiction moving image work by taking an active role as a participant.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra de no ficción de imagen en movimiento mediante la adopción de un papel activo como participante.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Appearance on screen to provide contextual or background information is excluded.

rdf:Description.reg:name: onScreenPresenter
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has on-screen presenter
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by appearing on screen to provide contextual or background information.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Appearance in nonfiction moving image materials or in introductions to fiction moving image materials is included. Appearance on screen in a non-performing role is excluded.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by appearing on screen to provide contextual or background information.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en apparaissant à l’écran pour fournir de l’information contextuelle ou complémentaire.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra para ofrecer en pantalla información contextual o básica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: operaAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is opera adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as an opera.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as an opera.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée à l’opéra.
Una expresión de una obra que ha sido adaptada como una ópera.

rdf:Description.reg:name: oratorioAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is oratorio adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as an oratorio.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as an oratorio.
Una expresión de una obra que ha sido adaptada como un oratorio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: otherDetailsOfCartographicContent
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an indication of mathematical data and other features of the cartographic content of an expression not recorded in statements of scale, projection, and coordinates.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An indication of mathematical data and other features of the cartographic content of an expression not recorded in statements of scale, projection, and coordinates.
Données mathématiques et autres particularités du contenu cartographique d’une ressource qui ne sont pas enregistrées dans les mentions d’échelle, de projection et de coordonnées.
Datos matemáticos y otras características del contenido cartográfico de un recurso, que no se han registrado en las menciones de escala, proyección y coordenadas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has other details of cartographic content
har övrig kartografisk data

rdf:Description.reg:name: otherDistinguishingCharacteristicOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has other distinguishing characteristic of expression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a characteristic other than content type, language of expression, or date of expression serving to differentiate an expression from another expression of the same work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A characteristic other than content type, language of expression, or date of expression serving to differentiate an expression from another expression of the same work.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Elle sert à distinguer une expression d’une autre expression de la même œuvre.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Caractéristique autre que le type de contenu, la langue de l’expression ou la date de l’expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: otra característica distintiva de la expresión
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Una característica diferente del tipo de contenido, lengua de expresión o fecha de expresión.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har andra särskiljande egenskaper för uttrycket

rdf:Description.reg:name: panelist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has panelist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by participating in a program, often broadcast, where topics are discussed, usually with participation of experts in fields related to the discussion.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by participating in a program, often broadcast, where topics are discussed, usually with participation of experts in fields related to the discussion.

Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en participant à une émission (souvent diffusée) où des sujets sont discutés, habituellement avec la participation d’experts dans les domaines reliés à la discussion.

Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra participando en un programa (a menudo una transmisión) en el cual los temas se discuten generalmente con la participación de expertos en esos temas.

rdf:Description.reg:name: paraphrasedAsExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that restates the content of a source work in a different form.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that restates the content of a source work in a different form.
Expression d’une œuvre qui reprend le contenu de l’œuvre source sous une formulation différente.
Una expresión de una obra que replantea el contenido de una obra fuente en una forma diferente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is paraphrased as (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: paraphraseOfExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work used as the basis for a paraphrase, i.e., a restating of the content of a source work in a different form.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for a paraphrase, i.e., a restating of the content of a source work in a different form.
Expression d’une œuvre servant de base à une paraphrase, c’est-à-dire une reprise du contenu de l’œuvre source sous une formulation différente.
Una expresión de una obra utilizada como base para una paráfrasis, i. e., replanteamiento del contenido de la obra fuente en una forma diferente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is paraphrase of (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: parodiedAsExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that imitates the style or content of a source work for comic effect.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that imitates the style or content of a source work for comic effect.
Expression d’une œuvre qui imite le style ou le contenu de l’œuvre source dans le but de produire un effet comique.
Una expresión de una obra que imita el estilo o contenido de la obra fuente para crear un efecto cómico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is parodied as (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: parodyOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is parody of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work whose style or content is imitated for comic effect.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work whose style or content is imitated for comic effect.
Expression d’une œuvre dont le style ou le contenu est imité dans le but de produire un effet comique.
Una expresión de una obra cuyo estilo o contenido es imitado para crear un efecto cómico.

rdf:Description.reg:name: performer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has performer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by performing music, acting, dancing, speaking, etc., often in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by performing music, acting, dancing, speaking, etc., often in a musical or dramatic presentation, etc.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en exécutant de la musique, en jouant, en dansant, en parlant, etc. souvent dans une représentation musicale ou dramatique, etc.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra interpretando música, actuando, danzando, hablando, etc., generalmente en una producción musical o teatral, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: photographerExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an illustrator contributing to an expression of a work by providing supplementary photographic content to an original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An illustrator contributing to an expression of a work by providing supplementary photographic content to an original work.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Creation of content that is primarily artistic is excluded.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has photographer (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: placeOfCapture
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a place associated with the recording, filming, etc., of the content of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A place associated with the recording, filming, etc., of the content of an expression.
Le lieu associé à la captation (c’est-à-dire l’enregistrement, le tournage, etc.) du contenu d’une ressource.
El lugar asociado con la captura (i.e, grabación, filmación, etc.) del contenido del recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has place of capture
har inspelningsort

rdf:Description.reg:name: precededByExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that precedes, that is, is earlier in time or before in narrative, etc., a succeeding expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that precedes, that is, is earlier in time or before in narrative, etc., a succeeding expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui précède l’expression suivante (par exemple, qui lui est antérieure dans le temps ou dans un récit).
Una expresión de una obra que precede (por ej., es anterior en el tiempo o en la narración) la expresión que sigue.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is preceded by (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: presenter
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has presenter
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent mentioned in an "X presents:" credit for moving image materials and who is probably associated with production, finance, or distribution in some way.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent mentioned in an "X presents:" credit for moving image materials and who is probably associated with production, finance, or distribution in some way.

Personne, famille ou collectivité mentionnée dans un générique d’images animées sous la forme « X présente » et qui est probablement associée d’une façon quelconque à la production, au financement ou à la distribution.

Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra dirigiendo un programa (a menudo una transmisión) que incluye otros invitados, intérpretes, etc., (por ej., presentadores de programas de debates).

rdf:Description.reg:name: productionDesigner
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has production designer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent responsible for designing the overall visual appearance of a moving image production.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent responsible for designing the overall visual appearance of a moving image production.
Personne, famille ou collectivité responsable de concevoir l’aspect visuel global d’une production d’images animées.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa responsable del diseño de la apariencia visual general de una producción de una imagen en movimiento.

rdf:Description.reg:name: projectionOfCartographicContent
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has projection of cartographic content
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a method or system used to represent the surface of the earth or of a celestial sphere on a plane.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A method or system used to represent the surface of the Earth or of a celestial sphere on a plane.
La méthode ou le système utilisé pour représenter la surface de la Terre ou d’une sphère céleste sur un plan.
El medio o sistema utilizado para representar la superficie de la Tierra o de una esfera celeste en un plano.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har kartprojektion

rdf:Description.reg:name: puppeteer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has puppeteer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by manipulating, controlling, or directing puppets or marionettes in a moving image production or a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by manipulating, controlling, or directing puppets or marionettes in a moving image production or a musical or dramatic presentation or entertainment.

Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en manipulant, en contrôlant ou en dirigeant des marionnettes dans une production d’images animées ou bien dans une représentation ou un spectacle musical ou dramatique.

Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra manipulando, controlando o dirigiendo títeres o marionetas en una producción de imágenes en movimiento o producción teatral, musical o un espectáculo.

rdf:Description.reg:name: radioAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is radio adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a radio program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a radio program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en émission de radio.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como programa de radio.

rdf:Description.reg:name: radioProgramMusicExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is radio program music (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that is used in a radio program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that is used in a radio program.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale utilisée dans une émission de radio.
Una expresión de una obra musical que es usada en un programa radiofónico.

rdf:Description.reg:name: radioScriptBasedOnExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as the script for a radio program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a script for a radio program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en script d’émission de radio.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como el guión de un programa de radio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is radio script based on (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: radioScriptExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides text for a radio program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides text for a radio program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit le texte d’une émission de radio.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona el texto para un programa de radio.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is radio script (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: recordingEngineer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has recording engineer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an audio engineer contributing to the audio content of an expression by supervising the technical aspects of a recording session.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An audio engineer contributing to the audio content of an expression by supervising the technical aspects of a recording session.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en supervisant les aspects techniques d’une séance d’enregistrement sonore ou vidéo.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra supervisando los aspectos técnicos de una sesión de grabación de sonido o video.

rdf:Description.reg:name: recordist
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has recordist
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by using a recording device to capture sound and/or video during a recording session, including field recordings of natural sounds, folkloric events, music, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by using a recording device to capture sound and/or video during a recording session, including field recordings of natural sounds, folkloric events, music, etc.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en utilisant un appareil d’enregistrement pour capter le son et/ou la vidéo durant une séance d’enregistrement, y compris les enregistrements de terrain de sons naturels, de prestations folkloriques, de musique, etc.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra utilizando un mecanismo de grabación para capturar sonido y/o video durante una sesión de grabación, incluyendo grabación de sonidos naturales, eventos folclóricos, música, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: relatedAgentExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related agent (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent associated with an expression being described.

rdf:Description.reg:name: relatedCollectiveAgentExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related collective agent (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a collective agent associated with an expression being described.

rdf:Description.reg:name: relatedCorporateBodyExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related corporate body (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a corporate body associated with an expression being described.

rdf:Description.reg:name: relatedEntityExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related entity (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an entity associated with an expression being described.

rdf:Description.reg:name: relatedExpressionExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related expression (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression associated with an expression being described.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har relaterat uttryck

rdf:Description.reg:name: relatedFamilyExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related family (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a family associated with an expression being described.

rdf:Description.reg:name: relatedItemExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related item (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an item associated with an expression being described.

rdf:Description.reg:name: relatedManifestationExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related manifestation (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a manifestation associated with an expression being described.

rdf:Description.reg:name: relatedNomenExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related nomen (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a nomen associated with an expression being described.

rdf:Description.reg:name: relatedPersonExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related person (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a person associated with an expression being described.

rdf:Description.reg:name: relatedPlaceExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related place (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a place associated with an expression being described.

rdf:Description.reg:name: relatedWorkExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related work (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a work associated with an expression being described.

rdf:Description.reg:name: relatetdTimespanExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has related time-span (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a time-span associated with an expression being described.

rdf:Description.reg:name: remadeAsExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is remade as (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a motion picture, radio program, television program, or video based on an earlier work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a new motion picture, radio program, television program, or video based on an earlier work.
Expression d’un nouveau film, d’une nouvelle émission de radio, d’une nouvelle émission de télévision ou d’une nouvelle vidéo basée sur une œuvre antérieure.
Una expresión de una película cinematográfica, programa radial, programa de televisión o video nuevo basada en una obra anterior.

rdf:Description.reg:name: remakeOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is remake of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work used as a basis for a new motion picture, radio program, television program, or video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as a basis for a new motion picture, radio program, television program, or video.
Expression d’une œuvre servant de base à un nouveau film, une nouvelle émission de radio, une nouvelle émission de télévision ou une nouvelle vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra utilizada como base para una nueva película cinematográfica, programa de radio, televisión o video.

rdf:Description.reg:name: replacedByExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a later work used in place of an earlier expression, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier expression obsolete.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a later work used in place of an earlier expression, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier expression obsolete.

Expression d’une œuvre ultérieure utilisée à la place d’une expression antérieure, généralement parce que l’œuvre ultérieure contient de l’information nouvelle ou mise à jour qui rend l’expression antérieure obsolète.

Una expresión de una obra anterior cuyo contenido ha sido reemplazado por una expresión posterior, generalmente porque la obra posterior contiene información actualizada o nueva que hace obsoleta la expresión anterior.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to single-part units, multipart monographs, and integrating resources.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is replaced by (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: replacedInPartByExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a later work used in part in place of an earlier expression usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes part of the earlier expression obsolete.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a later work used in part in place of an earlier expression usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes part of the earlier expression obsolete.

Expression d’une œuvre ultérieure utilisée en partie à la place d’une expression antérieure, généralement parce que l’œuvre ultérieure contient de l’information nouvelle ou mise à jour qui rend une partie de l’expression antérieure obsolète.

Una expresión de una obra anterior cuyo contenido ha sido reemplazado parcialmente por una expresión posterior, generalmente porque la obra posterior contiene información actualizada o nueva que hace obsoleta la expresión anterior.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to single-part units, multipart monographs, and integrating resources.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is replaced in part by (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: replacementInPartOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is replacement in part of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of an earlier work whose content has been partially replaced by a later expression, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier expression obsolete.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of an earlier work whose content has been partially replaced by a later expression, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier expression obsolete.

Expression d’une œuvre antérieure dont le contenu a été partiellement remplacé par une expression ultérieure, généralement parce que l’œuvre ultérieure contient de l’information nouvelle ou mise à jour qui rend l’expression antérieure obsolète.

Una expresión de una obra anterior cuyo contenido ha sido reemplazado parcialmente por una expresión posterior, generalmente porque la obra posterior contiene información actualizada o nueva que hace obsoleta la expresión anterior.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to single-part units, multipart monographs, and integrating resources.

rdf:Description.reg:name: replacementOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is replacement of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of an earlier work whose content has been replaced by a later expression, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier expression obsolete.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of an earlier work whose content has been replaced by a later expression, usually because the later work contains updated or new information that makes the earlier expression obsolete.

Expression d’une œuvre antérieure dont le contenu a été remplacé par une expression ultérieure, généralement parce que l’œuvre ultérieure contient de l’information nouvelle ou mise à jour qui rend l’expression antérieure obsolète.

Una expresión de una obra anterior cuyo contenido ha sido reemplazado por una expresión posterior, generalmente porque la obra posterior contiene información actualizada o nueva que hace obsoleta la expresión anterior.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: This relationship applies generally to single-part units, multipart monographs, and integrating resources.

rdf:Description.reg:name: restorationistExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has restorationist (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent who contributes to an expression of a work by restoring and/or combining earlier expressions, which may be damaged or fragmentary, to create a new expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent who contributes to an expression of a work by restoring and/or combining earlier expressions, which may be damaged or fragmentary, to create a new expression.

rdf:Description.reg:name: reviewedInExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a work that contains a brief evaluation of a described expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that contains a brief evaluation of a described expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui contient une brève évaluation de l’expression décrite.
Una obra que contiene una evaluación breve de la expresión descrita.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is reviewed in (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: revisedAs
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is revised as
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been updated, corrected, or expanded.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been updated, corrected, or expanded.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été mise à jour, corrigée ou augmentée.
Una expresión de una obra que fue actualizada, corregida o ampliada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: revisionOf
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is revision of
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work used as the basis for an updated, corrected, or expanded version.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for an updated, corrected, or expanded version.
Expression d’une œuvre servant de base à une version mise à jour, corrigée ou augmentée.
Una expresión de una obra utilizada como base para una versión actualizada, corregida o ampliada.

rdf:Description.reg:name: scale
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a ratio of the dimensions of the content of an image or three-dimensional form to the dimensions of the thing that is represented.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Scale can apply to horizontal, vertical, angular, and/or other measurements represented in an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A ratio of the dimensions of the content of an image or three-dimensional form to the dimensions of the thing that is represented.
Le rapport entre les dimensions d’une image ou d’une forme tridimensionnelle, contenue ou matérialisée dans une ressource, et les dimensions de l’entité qu’elle représente.
La proporción de las dimensiones de una imagen o forma tridimensional incluida o incorporada en un recurso con las dimensiones de la entidad que representa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has scale
har skala

rdf:Description.reg:name: scaleDesignation
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a general designation of the lack of a ratio of the dimensions of the content of an image or three-dimensional form to the dimensions of the thing that is represented.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A general designation of the lack of a ratio of the dimensions of the content of an image or three-dimensional form to the dimensions of the thing that is represented.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has scale designation

rdf:Description.reg:name: scaleOfStillImageOrThreeDimensionalForm
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a ratio of the dimensions of a still image or three-dimensional form contained or embodied in an expression to the dimensions of the thing that is represented.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: scale of still image or three-dimensional form
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A ratio of the dimensions of a still image or three-dimensional form contained or embodied in an expression to the dimensions of the thing that is represented.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: échelle d’une image fixe ou d’une forme tridimensionnelle
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Le rapport entre les dimensions d’une image fixe ou d’une forme tridimensionnelle, contenue ou matérialisée dans une ressource, et les dimensions de l’entité qu’elle représente.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: escala de una imagen fija o una forma tridimensional
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: La proporción de las dimensiones de una imagen fija o forma tridimensional que está contenida o incorporada en un recurso con las dimensiones de la entidad que representa.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has scale of still image or three-dimensional form
har skala för stillbild eller tredimensionell bild
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: skala för stillbild eller tredimensionell bild

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayBasedOnExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a screenplay for a motion picture, television program, or video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a screenplay for a motion picture, television program, or video.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en scénario pour un film, une émission de télévision ou une vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como guión para una película cinematográfica, programa de televisión o vídeo.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay based on (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides text for a motion picture, television program or video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides text for a motion picture, television program or video.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit le texte d’un film, d’une émission de télévision ou d’une vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona el texto para una película cinematográfica, programa de televisión o video.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayForExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work such as a motion picture, television program, or video, that uses the text of a work as a screenplay.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work such as a motion picture, television program, or video, that uses the text of a work as a screenplay.
Expression d’une œuvre telle qu’un film, une émission de télévision ou une vidéo qui utilise le texte de l’œuvre comme scénario.
Una expresión de una obra tal como una película cinematográfica, programa de televisión o video, que utiliza el texto de la obra como un guión cinematográfico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay for (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayForMotionPictureExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay for motion picture (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses the text as a screenplay for a motion picture.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses the text as a screenplay for a motion picture.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise le texte comme scénario d’un film.
Una expresión de una obra que utiliza el texto como un guión para una película cinematográfica.

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayForTelevisionProgramExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay for television program (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses the text as a screenplay for a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses the text as a screenplay for a television program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise le texte comme scénario d’une émission de télévision.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: guión para el programa de televisión (expresión)
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Una expresión de una obra que utiliza el texto como un guión para un programa de televisión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: screenplayForVideoExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is screenplay for video (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses the text as a screenplay for a video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses the text as a screenplay for a video.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise le texte comme scénario d’une vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra que utiliza el texto como un guión para un video.

rdf:Description.reg:name: script
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a set of characters or symbols used to express written language content of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A set of characters and/or symbols used to express written language content of an expression.
Ensemble de caractères et/ou de symboles utilisé pour exprimer le contenu linguistique écrit d’une ressource.
Un conjunto de caracteres y/o símbolos utilizados para expresar en lengua escrita el contenido de un recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has script

rdf:Description.reg:name: scriptForRadioProgramExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that uses the text as a script for a radio program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that uses the text as a script for a radio program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui utilise le texte de l’œuvre source comme script d’une émission de radio.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: guión para el programa de radio (expresión)
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: Una expresión de una obra que utiliza el texto de la obra fuente como el guión para un programa radiofónico.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is script for radio program (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: separatedFromExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is separated from (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that spun off a part of its content to form a new expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that spun off a part of its content to form a new expression.
Expression d’une œuvre dont une partie du contenu a été détachée pour former une nouvelle expression.
Una expresión de una obra que se desprende de una parte de su contenido para formar una expresión nueva.

rdf:Description.reg:name: sequentialExpressionRelationship
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is preceded by or succeeded by another expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is preceded by or succeeded by another expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui est précédée ou suivie par l’expression.
Una expresión de una obra que es precedida por o sucedida por la expresión.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has sequential expression relationship

rdf:Description.reg:name: setToMusicAsExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a non-dramatic musical work, other than an oratorio, that uses the text of a source work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a non-dramatic musical work, other than an oratorio, that uses the text of a source work.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale non théâtrale, autre qu’un oratorio, qui utilise le texte de l’œuvre source.
Una expresión de una obra musical no dramática, diferente de un oratorio, que usa el texto de la obra fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is set to music as (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: singer
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has singer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by using his/her/their voice, with or without instrumental accompaniment, to produce music.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: A singer's performance may or may not include actual words.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by using his/her/their voice, with or without instrumental accompaniment, to produce music.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en utilisant sa voix, avec ou sans accompagnement instrumental, pour produire de la musique.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra usando su voz, sus voces, con o sin acompañamiento instrumental, para producir música.

rdf:Description.reg:name: softwareDeveloper
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by researching, designing, implementing, or testing software.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by researching, designing, implementing, or testing software.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra mediante la investigación, diseño, implementación, y la realización de pruebas del software.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has software developer

rdf:Description.reg:name: soundContent
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a presence or absence of sound in an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A presence or absence of sound in an expression.
Le son présent dans une ressource qui n’est pas constituée principalement de son enregistré.
La presencia de sonido en un recurso, diferente al que consiste primariamente de sonido grabado.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has sound content
har ljudinnehåll

rdf:Description.reg:name: soundDesigner
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has sound designer
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by designing and creating audio/sound components.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by designing and creating audio/sound components.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra mediante el diseño y la creación de componentes de sonido.

rdf:Description.reg:name: speaker
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has speaker
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by speaking words, such as a lecture, speech, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by speaking words, such as a lecture, speech, etc.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en énonçant des paroles, telles qu’un exposé, un discours, etc.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra haciendo u ofreciendo conferencias, discursos, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: specialEffectsProvider
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has special effects provider
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a moving image or audio work by designing and creating on-set special effects such as on-set mechanical effects and in-camera optical effects.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a moving image or audio work by designing and creating on-set special effects such as on-set mechanical effects and in-camera optical effects.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre d’images animées ou d’une œuvre audio en concevant et en créant des effets spéciaux de plateau (effets mécaniques de plateau et effets d’optique dans la caméra).

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una imagen en movimiento u obra sonora mediante el diseño y creación de efectos especiales del set (efectos mecánicos en el set y efectos ópticos en cámara).

rdf:Description.reg:name: splitIntoExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of one of two or more works resulting from division of an earlier expression into separate expressions.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of one of two or more works resulting from division of an earlier expression into separate expressions.
Expression de l’une de deux ou plusieurs œuvres résultant de la division d’une expression antérieure en expressions séparées.
Una expresión de una de dos o más obras que resulta de la división de una entidad anterior en entidades separadas.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is split into (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: stageDirector
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has stage director
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a stage work through the general management and supervision of a performance.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a stage work through the general management and supervision of a performance.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre scénique par la gestion et la supervision générales d’une prestation.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra escénica mediante la dirección y supervisión general de una interpretación.

rdf:Description.reg:name: storyteller
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has storyteller
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a performer contributing to an expression of a work by relaying a creator's original story with dramatic or theatrical interpretation.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A performer contributing to an expression of a work by relaying a creator's original story with dramatic or theatrical interpretation.
Interprète contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en racontant l’histoire originale d’un créateur dans une interprétation dramatique ou théâtrale.
Un intérprete que contribuye a una expresión de una obra contando una historia de un creador original mediante una interpretación dramática o teatral.

rdf:Description.reg:name: subjectOfExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a work that is about an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work that is about an expression.
Una obra que trata sobre la expresión.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is subject of (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: succeededByExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that succeeds, that is, is later in time or after in a narrative, etc., a preceding expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that succeeds, that is, is later in time or after in a narrative, etc., a preceding expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui succède à l’expression précédente (par exemple, qui lui est ultérieure dans le temps ou dans un récit).
Una expresión de una obra que sucede a (por ej., posterior en el tiempo o posterior en una narración) la expresión predecesora.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is succeeded by (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: summarizationOfContent
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an abstract, summary, synopsis, etc., of the content of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An abstract, summary, synopsis, etc., of the content of an expression.
Synthèse, résumé, synopsis, etc. du contenu d’une ressource.
Un resumen, sumario, sinopsis, etc., del contenido de un recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has summarization of content
har innehållsbeskrivning

rdf:Description.reg:name: summarizedAsExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that consists of a brief recapitulation of the content of a source expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that consists of a brief recapitulation of the content of a source expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui consiste en une brève récapitulation du contenu de l’expression source.
Una expresión de una obra que consiste en una recapitulación breve del contenido de la expresión fuente.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is summarized as (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: summaryOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is summary of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work used as the basis for a brief recapitulation of its content.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work used as the basis for a brief recapitulation of its content.
Expression d’une œuvre servant de base à une brève récapitulation de son contenu.
Una expresión de una obra usada como base para una recapitulación breve de su contenido.

rdf:Description.reg:name: supplementaryContent
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an indication of content that updates or complements the primary content of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An indication of content that updates or complements the primary content of an expression.
Contenu (par exemple, un index, une bibliographie, une annexe) conçu pour compléter le contenu principal d’une ressource.
Contenido (por j., un índice, una bibliografía, un apéndice) destinado a suplementar el contenido primario de un recurso.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Supplementary content may include an index, a bibliography, or an appendix.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has supplementary content
har bihang

rdf:Description.reg:name: supplementExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that updates or otherwise complements a predominant expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that updates or otherwise complements a predominant expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui met à jour ou complète d’une autre façon l’expression prédominante.
Una expresión de una obra que actualiza o complementa la expresión principal.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is supplement (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: supplementToExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that is updated or otherwise complemented by an augmenting expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that is updated or otherwise complemented by an augmenting expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui est mise à jour ou complétée d’une autre façon par l’expression augmentante.
Una expresión de una obra que es actualizada o complementada por la expresión que aumenta.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is supplement to (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: surveyor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a cartographic work by providing measurements or dimensional relationships for a geographic area represented.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a cartographic work by providing measurements or dimensional relationships for a geographic area represented.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre cartographique en fournissant les mesures ou les relations dimensionnelles pour l’aire géographique représentée.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra cartográfica proporcionando medidas o relaciones dimensionales para el área geográfica representada.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has surveyor

rdf:Description.reg:name: televisionAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is television adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a television program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en émission de télévision.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como programa de televisión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: televisionProgramMusicExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is television program music (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that is used in a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that is used in a television program.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale utilisée dans une émission de télévision.
Una expresión de una obra musical que es usada en un programa de televisión.

rdf:Description.reg:name: televisionScreenplayBasedOnExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a screenplay for a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a screenplay for a television program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en scénario pour une émission de télévision.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como guión para un programa de televisión.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is television screenplay based on (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: televisionScreenplayExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides text for a television program.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides text for a television program.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit le texte d’une émission de télévision.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona el texto para un programa de televisión.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is television screenplay (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: transcriber
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has transcriber
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by writing down or notating unwritten or unnotated content, or by changing it from one system of notation to another.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by writing down or notating unwritten or unnotated content, or by changing it from one system of notation to another.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en écrivant ou en notant un contenu auparavant non écrit ou non noté, ou bien en le transposant d’un système de notation à un autre.

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra mediante la escritura o notación de contenido no escrito o no notado, o cambiando de un sistema de notación a otro.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Transcription of a musical work for a different instrument or performing group is excluded.

rdf:Description.reg:name: translatedAs
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that translates the text of a source expression into a language different from that of an original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that translates the text of a source expression into a language different from that of an original work.
Expression d’une œuvre qui traduit le texte de l’expression source dans une langue différente de celle de l’œuvre d’origine.
Una expresión de una obra que traduce el texto de una expresión fuente a una lengua diferente a la de la obra original.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is translated as

rdf:Description.reg:name: translationOf
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been translated, i.e., the text expressed in a language different from that of an original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been translated, i.e., the text expressed in a language different from that of an original work.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été traduite, c’est-à-dire dont le texte a été exprimé dans une langue différente de celle de l’œuvre d’origine.
Una expresión de una obra que fue traducida, i.e., el texto expresado en una lengua diferente de la utilizada en la obra original.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is translation of

rdf:Description.reg:name: translator
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by expressing the linguistic content of the work in a language different from that of previous expressions of the original work.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Translation of linguistic content between forms of the same language from different time periods is included.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by expressing the linguistic content of the work in a language different from that of previous expressions of the original work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en exprimant le texte original de l’œuvre dans une langue différente de celle de l’œuvre originale.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra expresando el contenido linguístico de la obra en una lengua diferente de las expresiones previas de la obra.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has translator

rdf:Description.reg:name: variationsBasedOnExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is variations based on (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work from which melodic, thematic, or harmonic material is taken to form a discrete theme, which is repeated one or more times with subsequent modifications.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work from which melodic, thematic, or harmonic material is taken to form a discrete theme, which is repeated one or more times with subsequent modifications.

Expression d’une œuvre musicale d’où est tirée de la matière mélodique, thématique ou harmonique pour former un thème distinct, qui est répété une ou plusieurs fois avec des modifications subséquentes.
Una expresión de una obra musical de la cual se toma el material melódico, temático o armónico para formar un tema separado, el cual es repetido una o más veces con modificaciones subsecuentes.

rdf:Description.reg:name: verseAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is verse adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a literary composition in verse form.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a literary composition in verse form.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée sous forme de composition littéraire en vers.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como una composición literaria en forma de verso.

rdf:Description.reg:name: verticalScaleOfCartographicContent
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a scale of elevation or vertical dimension of cartographic content of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A scale of elevation or vertical dimension of cartographic content of an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitLabel: échelle des hauteurs d’un contenu cartographique
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: L’échelle de l’élévation ou de la dimension verticale du contenu cartographique d’une ressource.
La escala de elevación o dimensión vertical del contenido cartográfico de un recurso.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has vertical scale of cartographic content
har vertikal skala för kartografiskt innehåll

rdf:Description.reg:name: videoAdaptationOfExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is video adaptation of (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted for video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted for video.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada para video.

rdf:Description.reg:name: videoMusicExpression
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is video music (expression)
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a musical work that is used in a video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a musical work that is used in a video.
Expression d’une œuvre musicale utilisée dans une vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra musical que es usada en un video.

rdf:Description.reg:name: videoScreenplayBasedOnExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that has been adapted as a screenplay for a video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that has been adapted as a screenplay for a video.
Expression d’une œuvre qui a été adaptée en scénario pour une vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra que fue adaptada como guión para un video.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is video screenplay based on (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: videoScreenplayExpression
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression of a work that provides text for a video.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression of a work that provides text for a video.
Expression d’une œuvre qui fournit le texte d’une vidéo.
Una expresión de una obra que proporciona el texto para un video.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: is video screenplay (expression)

rdf:Description.reg:name: visualEffectsProvider
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has visual effects provider
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a moving image work by designing and creating post-production visual effects.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a moving image work by designing and creating post-production visual effects.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre d’images animées en concevant et en créant des effets visuels en postproduction.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra de imagen en movimiento desarrollando y creando efectos visuales de post-producción.

rdf:Description.reg:name: voiceActor
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has voice actor
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an actor contributing to an expression of a work by providing the voice for characters in radio and audio productions and for animated characters in moving image works, as well as by providing voice-overs in radio and television commercials, dubbed expressions, etc.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An actor contributing to an expression of a work by providing the voice for characters in radio and audio productions and for animated characters in moving image works, as well as by providing voice-overs in radio and television commercials, dubbed resources, etc.

Acteur contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en prêtant sa voix à des personnages dans des productions radiophoniques et audio et à des personnages animés dans des œuvres d’images animées, de même qu’en prêtant sa voix hors champ dans des messages publicitaires à la radio et à la télévision, du doublage, etc.

Un actor que contribuye a una expresión de una obra proporcionando la voz de los personajes en radio y producciones de sonido y de personajes animados en obras de imágenes en movimiento, al igual que proporcionando voces sobrepuestas en comerciales de radio y televisión, recursos de doblaje, etc.

rdf:Description.reg:name: wholePartExpressionRelationship
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an expression that is contained in or contains another expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An expression that is contained in or contains another expression.
Expression d’une œuvre qui est contenue dans l’expression ou la contient.
Una expresión que es incluida en, o contiene la expresión.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has whole-part expression relationship

rdf:Description.reg:name: workExpressed
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has work expressed
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a work realized through an expression.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A work realized through an expression.
L’œuvre réalisée à travers une expression.
La obra realizada mediante una expresión
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: har uttryckt verk

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfAddedCommentary
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing an interpretation or critical explanation of an original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing an interpretation or critical explanation of an original work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant une interprétation ou une critique de l’œuvre originale.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra ofreciendo una interpretación o explicación crítica de la obra original.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of added commentary

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfAddedLyrics
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of added lyrics
