rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to a writer of words added to an expression of a musical work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: A writer of words added to an expression of a musical work.
Auteur de paroles ajoutées à une expression d’une œuvre musicale.
Un autor que agrega palabras a una expresión de una obra musical.
rdf:Description.skos:scopeNote: Writing of lyrics in collaboration with a composer to form an original work is excluded.

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfAddedText
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a primarily non-textual work by providing text, such as writing captions for photographs or descriptions of maps.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a primarily non-textual work by providing text, such as writing captions for photographs or descriptions of maps.

Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre essentiellement non textuelle en fournissant un texte pour l’œuvre non textuelle (par exemple, en écrivant des légendes pour des photographies, des descriptions de cartes géographiques).

Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra que no es básicamente texto ofreciendo texto para la obra no textual (por ej., titulación de fotografías, descripción de mapas).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of added text

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfAfterword
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing an afterword to an original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing an afterword to an original work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant un après-propos à l’œuvre originale.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra proporcionando un epílogo a la obra original.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of afterword

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfForeword
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing a foreword to an original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing a foreword to an original work.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra proporcionando un prólogo a la obra original.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of foreword

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfIntroduction
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing an introduction to an original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing an introduction to an original work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant une introduction à l’œuvre originale.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra ofreciendo una introducción a la obra original.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of introduction

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfPostface
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing a postface to an original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing a postface to an original work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant une postface à l’œuvre originale.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra proporcionando unas palabras finales o conclusiones al original de la obra.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of postface

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfPreface
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing a preface to an original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing a preface to an original work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant une préface à l’œuvre originale.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra ofreciendo un prefacio a la obra original.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of preface

rdf:Description.reg:name: writerOfSupplementaryTextualContent
rdf:Description.skos:definition: Relates an expression to an agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing supplementary textual content, such as an introduction or a preface, to an original work.
rdf:Description.rdakit:toolkitDefinition: An agent contributing to an expression of a work by providing supplementary textual content, such as an introduction or a preface, to an original work.
Personne, famille ou collectivité contribuant à une expression d’une œuvre en fournissant du contenu textuel supplémentaire (par exemple, une introduction, une préface) à l’œuvre originale.
Una persona, familia o entidad corporativa que contribuye a una expresión de una obra ofreciendo contenido textual suplementario (por ej., una introducción, un prefacio) a la obra original.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: has writer of supplementary textual content
